sections.text: SourceLaws 1981, LB 253, ยง 8.Termination Date: September 30, 2030

81-1548.04.Gross proceeds, defined.

Gross proceeds shall mean the total receipts from all sales less expenditures for the purchase of any item in this state for the purpose of recycling such item.

SourceLaws 1981, LB 253, ยง 8.Termination Date: September 30, 2030
